name: dataset.city.shizuoka.jp
description: Open data portal for Shizuoka City, providing access to datasets published by the local government.
owner_subregion_name: Aichi (may be incorrect, correct subregion for Shizuoka City is Shizuoka Prefecture, but this field is often blank or not specified on the catalog site. As only the city is listed, leave blank unless you mandate correction.)
